Art. 4.115. 
Maintenance of undivided ownership
 Where one of the co-heirs is a minor of at least sixteen years of age, the joint ownership of the farm may, at the request of the minor's legal representatives, be maintained by the family court for a term not extending beyond the majority of that co-heir.
 The decision to maintain indivision is recorded in a register at the relevant office of the General Administration of Property Documentation.
 If the decision is not transcribed, it cannot be relied upon against bona fide third parties who have a competing right to the property.
